document.description: Take aim with Cupids arrow and shoot down the lonely hearts club. ... Ice Breaker; Ice Breaker RC; Ice Breakout; Ice Racer; Ice Slide; Ice Temple; Icy Slicy

You need to install Adobe Flash Player to play Love's Arrow . Download the Flash Player now . Click here to download the Adobe Flash Player Advertisement Feedback Click and drag bowstring to aim, release to shoot arrow. Help Love's Arrow Shoot 'Em Up Take aim with Cupids arrow and shoot down the lonely hearts club this Valentines Day.

Save your High Scores Win Game Awards Play With Friends Customise your YoMe! ▲ Miniclip likes Cookies x At Miniclip we use cookies to make your experience more enjoyable.
Cookies are simple text files stored on your computer that we use for things like website logins, and making games more fun.
If you are happy with Miniclip's use of cookies please carry on browsing the site. However, if you do not want Miniclip to store cookies please review our Privacy Policy and follow the instructions.
